# Government Tender Announcement: Single Cell Printer
### Details

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Procurement Reference Number** | WS3843220219-Doc3843250268 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3843220219 |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open bidding |
| **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Price |

### Details of the Tender

* **Title**: Single Cell Printer
* **End-User Entity**: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* **Location of Delivery**: Winnipeg
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSC)
* **Contact Information**
	+ **Name**: Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ **Email**: [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Tender Description**: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the supply and delivery of one (1) Single Cell Printer. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be provided by 2023-03-24 at 14:00 hours Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Late submissions will not be considered responsive.

### Tender Status
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-24T14:00:00 (Modified closing time)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Provincial Trade Agreements**: NIL
* **Territorial Trade Agreements**: NIL
* **Tender Status**: Expiré
